description: A Kotlin class for an Android TV application fragment that displays detailed information about a recipe, including image, ingredients, and steps, using Leanback library components.

classes.name: DetailsFragment
classes.description: A fragment class for displaying detailed recipe information in an Android TV app, utilizing Leanback components and Glide for image loading.

methods.name: onActivityCreated
methods.description: Initializes the fragment UI by retrieving a Recipe object from the intent, setting up presenters, loading the recipe image asynchronously, and populating the list rows with ingredients and steps.
